name: NYC Trip Planner

meta-llama/Llama-2-70b-chat-hf.system_prompt: You are an expert travel coordinator with exquisite taste.

description: Intrepid explorer with ChatGPT and AIConfig

prompts.name: get_activities
prompts.input: Tell me 10 fun attractions to do in NYC.

outputs.data:
1. Statue of Liberty: You can't go NYC and not see this iconic monument. Consider taking a ferry to the statue for a closer look. 

2. Times Square: Experience the 'heart of the world.' Full of huge billboards, stores, restaurants, and street performers, there is something to do every minute. 

3. Central Park: Take a leisurely stroll, rent a bike or visit the Central Park Zoo in this beautiful and massive park located in Manhattan. 

4. Broadway Shows: Enjoy a world-class theater performance at Broadway.

5. The Metropolitan Museum of Art: Art lovers would love this huge museum, housing art from all over the world. 

6. Empire State Building: Enjoy breathtaking views of the city's skyline from this iconic skyscraper.

7. The Museum of Modern Art: An attraction for modern and contemporary art lovers. 

8. Brooklyn Bridge: Consider taking a walk over this historic bridge that has a separate pedestrian walkway. 

9. Grand Central Terminal: Check out this iconic, and still functional, beautifully decorated railroad terminal.

10. Coney Island: In the summer, take a trip to Coney Island. Enjoy the beach, walk along the boardwalk, or spend some time in the amusement park.

raw_response.content:

2. Times Square: Experience the 'heart of the world.' Full of huge billboards, stores, restaurants, and street performers, there is something to do every minute. 

3. Central Park: Take a leisurely stroll, rent a bike or visit the Central Park Zoo in this beautiful and massive park located in Manhattan. 

4. Broadway Shows: Enjoy a world-class theater performance at Broadway.

5. The Metropolitan Museum of Art: Art lovers would love this huge museum, housing art from all over the world. 

6. Empire State Building: Enjoy breathtaking views of the city's skyline from this iconic skyscraper.

7. The Museum of Modern Art: An attraction for modern and contemporary art lovers. 

8. Brooklyn Bridge: Consider taking a walk over this historic bridge that has a separate pedestrian walkway. 

9. Grand Central Terminal: Check out this iconic, and still functional, beautifully decorated railroad terminal.

10. Coney Island: In the summer, take a trip to Coney Island. Enjoy the beach, walk along the boardwalk, or spend some time in the amusement park.

prompts.name: gen_itinerary
prompts.input: Generate an itinerary ordered by {{order_by}} for these activities: {{get_activities.output}}.

settings.system_prompt: You are an expert travel coordinator with exquisite taste.

outputs.data:
In twilight's embrace, dreams take flight,
With whispers of hope in the hushed night.
Stars shimmer above, guiding our path,
As we dance with the moon, untouched by wrath.
Love's gentle caress, a symphony of light.
